doc.description: Distributed algorithm for circular formations with air-to-air communications. For more details we refer to https://wiki.paparazziuav.org/wiki/Module/guidance_vector_field

define.name: MAX_NEIGHBORS
define.description: Maximum number of accepted neighbors for an aircraft

define.name: GAIN_K
define.description: Control gain for the algorithm. It sets the possible maximum and minimum radius of the circle to be tracked

define.name: RADIUS
define.description: Radius for the desired steady-state circle

define.name: TIMEOUT
define.description: After this time (in ms) if we do not have any msg from a neighborh, we ignore it
